description.default: Status Bar Pomodoro, Annotation, Bottom Backlinks, Sync Blocks, Block Relationship Graph, Text to Reference, Flash Idea via Camera, Reading Points, Two-Way Mutual Links, AI Knowledge Base Q&A, Streaming AI, Database Backlinks, Flashcard Priority, Document Merge, Recurring Reminders, Delete Cards During Review, Flashcard Image Cloze, Move to Today's Notes, Clean Up Invalid Flashcards
